pullrequest.title: Prevent GUI from jumping around, pixel saving, analysis submission improvements

content.raw: Looks good, I just need to make some tabs crash at various stages to confirm that the new error messages display properly, then I'll merge this and the corresponding "Correctly resize for multi-line QLabels" in labscipt_ultils
